innerAbility.name: Ideal Preset
innerAbility.notes: %Buff Duration replaces %Dmg to Abnormal Status as Link Skill benefits more from Buff Duration IA. For Training, +15% Meso Obtained and +15% Item Drop Rate can be used for 2nd & 3rd Line

buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/link-skills/terms-and-conditions.png} tooltip={Terms and Conditions (Link Skill)} duration={[10s](60s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/pretty-exaltation.png} tooltip={Pretty Exaltation (Hyper Skill)} duration={[20s](60s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/final-contract.png} tooltip={Final Contract (Hyper Skill)} duration={[30s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/overdrive.png} tooltip={Overdrive (5th Job)} duration={[28s](60s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/grandis-goddess-blessing.png} tooltip={Grandis Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} duration={[40s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/might-of-the-nova.png} tooltip={Might of the Nova (5th Job)} duration={[960s](1200s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/loaded-dice.png} tooltip={Loaded Dice (5th Job)}>(10s cd)(180s cd <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tooltip={Roll of the Dice (5th Job)}>)

build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Soul Seeker – Reinforce and Make Up
  • Finale Ribbon – Armorbreak
  • Trinity – Reinforce and Extra Strike

nodeInfo.recommended:
Bossing Trio
Mobbing Trio
  • Either categories can be maxed first based on if you prioritize bossing or mobbing
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category so that the skills boosted match your priorities
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Angelic Buster Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/23/Pink_Power_Superstar} title={"Pink Power Superstar"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Soul Buster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 2, Hold the attack key to fire Eskalade's power forward\nCan be used while moving. Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 60%
primary.desc: Holding the Attack Key fire bullets forward
details: Can move while attacking

primary.name: True Heart Inheritance
primary.shortDesc: Soul Shooter Mastery: +10%
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/23/Pink_Power_Superstar} title={"Pink Power Superstar"}>

primary.name: Grappling Heart
primary.shortDesc: Move to the nearest platform above you.\nPress jump while moving to cancel.

primary.name: Terms and Condition
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 10 sec, Damage: +120%\nEffect reduced to half when used as a link skill\nCooldown: 60 sec
details: %Damage increase is halved for other characters when linked
Can be found in the <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/link-skills/link-manager.png} tooltip={Link Manager (Beginner Skill)}> Link Manager

primary.name: Day Dreamer
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Return to the Lovely Buster Suite\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: Once teleported, exiting the map will move you to Pantheon

primary.name: Dress-up
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Transform into Angelic Buster\nWhen used as Angelic Buster, transform back into Tear.
primary.desc: Switches between your normal form and transformed form
details: Using attacks will automatically transform you

primary.name: On Stage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, plays up to 5 tracks from Angelic Buster's album\nMovement ends the concert, only usable in town\nCooldown: 1 hour
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/23/On_Stage} title={"On Stage"}>

primary.name: Star Bubble
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 6, Max enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 165%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Fire a blast of bubbles forward

primary.name: Feather Hop
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Allows you to jump a greater distance.
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>
Horizontal jump an be used twice in a row

primary.name: Melody Cross
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +2500, Max MP: +2000, Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Affinity Heart
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Max Speed: +25, Jump: +20

primary.name: Lovely Sting
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 4

primary.name: Pink Pummel
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 125%, Number of Attacks: 4 while moving
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing back enemies

primary.name: Soul Shooter Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Soul Shooter Mastery: +50%, Attack Power +20

primary.name: Beautiful Soul
primary.shortDesc: DEX: +40, Final Damage: +5%

primary.name: Affinity Heart II
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +40, Elemental Resistance: +40%, Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +25%

primary.name: Power Transfer
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -50%

primary.name: Soul Seeker
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 19, Number of Essences: 2\nEssence Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 1 until the max attack count is reached or it disappears\nChance for Essence to Respawn on Hit: 85%, Number of Attacks: 7
primary.desc: Throw orbs that seek out and attack nearby enemies
details: After hitting an enemy, there is a chance to create another Soul Seeker at its location (up to 7 times)
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Star Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 185%, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: Blades strike down from above onto enemies in front of you

primary.name: Blossoming Star
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +40%, DEX: +20, Final Damage: +14%

primary.name: Dragon Whistle
primary.shortDesc: Attack +40, Ignore Defense: +16%, Critical Damage: +6%

primary.name: Love Me Heart
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +1000, Max MP: +1000, DEF: +1000, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Affinity Heart III
primary.shortDesc: DEX: +40, Damage: +10%, Final Damage: +10%

primary.name: Center Stage
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +10%, Critical Damage: +15%

primary.name: Celestial Roar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 580%, Number of Attacks: 4\nStun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 3 sec
primary.desc: Fire a shockwave forward that has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Trinity
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 23, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 630%, Number of Attacks: 6\nTrinity/Trinity Fusion Damage and Ignore Defense: +15%, Duration: 30 sec, Max Stacks: 2
primary.desc: Unleash a barrage of strikes forward
details: Upon successful hits, grants a stacking buff for only <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/trinity.png} tooltip={Trinity (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/trinity-fusion.png} tooltip={Trinity Fusion (5th Job)}> that increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF (up to 2 stacks)

primary.name: Finale Ribbon
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 10\nDamage Over Time: 30%, Damage Duration: 60 sec, Damage Interval: 1 sec, Party Member Damage (Excluding Angelic Buster): +20%\nCooldown: 40 sec
primary.desc: Swing ribbons that damage and debuff enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes damage over time and receives increased %Damage from party members (excluding Angelic Buster)

primary.name: Soul Seeker Expert
primary.shortDesc: 35% chance to create Soul Seeker when using Angelic Buster skills (excluding Soul Buster, Soul Seeker, and Superstar Spotlight)\nCelestial Roar and Trinity Creation Chance: +25%\nAutomatically created Soul Seekers deal 75% damage of directly craeted Soul Seekers
primary.desc: While toggled, successful attacks have a chance to activate <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/soul-seeker.png} tooltip={Soul Seeker (3rd Job)}> Soul Seekers
details: Deals reduced %Final Damage compared to manually using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/soul-seeker.png} tooltip={Soul Seeker (3rd Job)}>

The following skills have an increased chance to create Soul Seekers: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/celestial-roar.png} tooltip={Celestial Roar (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/trinity.png} tooltip={Trinity (4th Job)}>

The following skills will not create Soul Seekers: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/soul-buster.png} tooltip={Soul Buster (Beginner Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/soul-seeker.png} tooltip={Soul Seeker (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/superstar-spotlight.png} tooltip={Superstar Spotlight (5th Job)}>
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Soul Resonance
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Invincibility Duration: 2 sec
Hold down the key to continuously attack up to 10 enemies, for 145%, 5 times.
Hold for at least 8 sec to make a final blow that deals up to 600% damage 5 times based on the time held. Boss Damage: +50%
While casting, any Max HP scaling damage taken is reduced by 35%.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: While held, create a vortex that damages enemies within it
details: Upon casting, you are briefly invincible
While casting, take reduced damage (including %Max HP attacks) and you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
When the skill ends, deals an explosion that increases in damage based on how long the skill was held
Deals increased %Damage to bosses

primary.name: Star Gazer
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Critical Damage: +20%, Duration: 180 sec

primary.name: Nova Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Grandis Goddess appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Nova Temperance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tooltip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Soul Shooter Expert
primary.shortDesc: Soul Shooter Mastery: +70%\nAttack Power: +30, Final Damage: +21%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage

primary.name: Affinity Heart IV
primary.shortDesc: Angelic Buster skill damage (excluding Soul Seeker Expert and Grand Finale: Cheering Balloons): +25%, Duration: 30 sec
primary.desc: Successful attacks (excluding <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/soul-seeker-expert.png} tooltip={Soul Seeker Expert (4th Job)}> and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/grand-finale.png} tooltip={Grand Finale (6th Job)}> - Cheering Balloons) grant a %Damage buff
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tooltip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

hyperPassive.name: Finale Ribbon - Armorbreak
hyperPassive.desc: Permanently increases %Ignore DEF for all skills

hyperPassive.name: Trinity - Reinforce
hyperPassive.desc: Applies to <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/trinity.png} tooltip={Trinity (4th Job)}> and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/trinity-fusion.png} tooltip={Trinity Fusion (5th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Piercing Trinity
hyperPassive.desc: Applies to <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/trinity.png} tooltip={Trinity (4th Job)}> and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/trinity-fusion.png} tooltip={Trinity Fusion (5th Job)}>

hyperActive.name: Pretty Exaltation
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100, Final Damage: +5%, Duration: 20 sec
Chance to Create Soul Seeker Expert: 15%, Chance to Respawn Soul: 5%, Number of Soul Seekers Created: +2
Soul Seeker Final Damage: -45%, multiplied with Soul Seeker Expert's Final Damage reduction effect
Cooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Increases %Final Damage and enhances <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/soul-seeker-expert.png} tooltip={Soul Seeker Expert (4th Job)}>
details: While active, increases the number of Soul Seekers created, the chance to create and recreate but, further reduces the %Final Damage penalty (multiplicative)
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Supreme Supernova
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Energy Orb Duration: 12 sec\nEnergy Orb Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 3\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Create a large energy orb that damages enemies within it
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Final Contract
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150, Duration: 30 sec
Attack Power: +50, Damage: +10%, Ignore Defense: +30%, Boss Damage: +20%, Critical Rate: +30%
Abnormal Status Resistance: +100, Elemental Resistance: +100%
Cooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Sparkle Burst
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 600, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 15 Love Explosions: 15\nInvincible for 10 sec after 30 sec or when using the skill is used again.\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Release a blast of energy that attacks a wide area
details: After 30 secs of casting or when the Skill Key is pressed again, grants invincibility for 10 sec

fifthMain.name: Superstar Spotlight
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 600, Installs 3 spotlights that shine on you for 30 sec
While you are within the spotlight, you gain Status Resistance +78, Critical Rate +48%, and Final Damage +18%.
Each spotlight deals 1760% damage 3 times against up to 15 enemies within its area.
Each subsequent spotlight to hit the same enemy deals 75% less Final Damage.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: 3 Spotlights appear that shine light at your location which damages enemies inside it and provides a buff if you are in it
details: When within the spotlight, gain %Crit Rate, %Final Damage (additive), and Abnormal Status Resistance
Enemies damaged by multiple spotlights take reduced %Final Damage after the first
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the skill's background music
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Mighty Mascot
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 450, Can be held for up to 1.8 sec
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1265%, Number of Attacks: 5, Trigger 7 explosions that deals 1485% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times after skill release.
While casting this skill, any attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of MAx HP will suffer a -40% damage penalty.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, release an energy beam forward
details: While casting, gain increased %Damage Reduction against %Max HP attacks and cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
When the attack ends, deals an explosion attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Trinity Fusion
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, A dragon's enemy attacks 7 enemies, for 360% damage, 3 times. 9 attack(s) will occur in total.
While casting this skill, any attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of Max HP will suffer a -20% damage penalty.
Cooldown: 13 sec
[Passive Effect: DEX +40]
fifthMain.desc: Unleash a powerful blast attack around you
details: [Passive]: Grants flat DEX
While casting, gain increased %Damage Reduction against %Max HP attacks and cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF a function to activate the skill by pressing Down Arrow Key and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/trinity.png} tooltip={Trinity (4th Job)}> together

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/trinity.png} tooltip={Trinity and Trinity Fusion (4th Job / 5th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Trinity
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 1020%, Number of Attacks: 6\nHEXA Trinity/Trinity Fusion Damage and Ignore Defense: +15%, Duration: 30 sec, Max Stacks: 2
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/angelic-buster/soul-seeker.png} tooltip={Soul Seeker and Soul Seeker Expert (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Soul Seeker
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Number of Essences: 2\nEssence Damage: 432%, Number of Attacks: 1 until the max attack count is reached or it disappears\nChance for Essence to Respawn on Hit: 85%, Number of Attacks: 7
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Soul Seeker Expert
masteryCore.shortDesc: 36% chance to create Soul Seeker when using Angelic Buster skills (excluding Soul Buster, Soul Seeker, and Superstar Spotlight)\nCelestial Roar and Trinity Creation Chance: +25%\nAutomatically created Soul Seekers deal 75% damage of directly created Soul Seekers
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Grand Finale
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Invincible during casting, applies Affinity effect for 30 sec
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 694%, Number of Attacks: 9, Sound Waves: 12. Afterwards, Damage: 703%, Number of Attacks: 14, Cannon Roars: 38
25 Cheering Balloons at the finale target enemies.
Afterwards, Soul Seeker changes to Cheering Balloons for 30 sec.
Cheering Balloons - Damage: 490%, while Cheering Balloons created while the buff is active deal 673% damage and attack 7 times, with the same chance to respawn upon hit as Soul Seekers. Each subsequent Cheering Balloon created while the buff is active that hits the same enemy deals 43% less Final Damage.
Additional Cheering Balloons: 10, Cheering Balloons that fly in the finale only have Pretty Exaltation's increased respawn chance, and Soul Seekers that become Cheering Balloons have all of Pretty Exaltation's effects.
Cooldown: 360 sec
details: [Note]: The cutscene is still from pre-redux, click <link href={https://g.nexonstatic.com/media/0frn11dh/angelic-buster-redux-6th-skill-v2.mp4} title={here}> for an updated cutscene version but does not show the Cheering Balloons

meta: Angelic Buster is a DEX pirate class part of the Nova. Angelic Buster utilize Soul Shooter as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Angelic buster can equip Soul Rings
